attributes.name: Brow Wiz
attributes.how-to-text:
* With the spooley end, brush brow hair up.
* Draw a thin line along the hairline, following your lower arch.
* Brush brow hair down, then define upper arch using the same technique.
* Fill in gaps or sparse areas, then groom to blend color through brows.
attributes.description: Create a perfect arch that follows your natural bone structure with the ultra-slim Brow Wiz, a precise mechanical pencil with a retractable tip that glides effortlessly to mimic fine hair.
attributes.benefits: Ideal for filling in sparse or over-tweezed areas, this pencil’s smudge-proof formula stays put for fresh, natural-looking brows.

attributes.name: Positive Light Under Eye Brightener
attributes.heading: 4ml
attributes.how-to-text:
* Wear on its own for a fresh, wide-awake look, or layer it over your go-to concealer for an extra brightening effect.
* Using the metal cool-tip applicator, apply 2-4 dots to your undereye area, then tap to blend using your fingertip or brush.
* Repeat as needed for desired coverage.
* For max soothing and cooling, gently glide the applicator across the undereyes, then tap to blend.
* Tip: You can even apply it to the high points of your face (tops of cheekbones, brow bone, temples) as a natural highlight. Think subtle brightness and glowy skin.
attributes.description: A super lightweight liquid that instantly brightens, hydrates and awakens the undereyes with sheer, flexible coverage for a fresh look in a flash.
attributes.benefits: This no-makeup makeup essential helps reduce the look of dark circles and discolouration for an instantly refreshed look. In 6 flexible shades, the ultra fluid texture makes blending quick and seamless while soothing skin on contact. It lasts all day and won’t crease, cake or settle into fine lines.

attributes.name: Glycolic Acid 7% Toning Solution
attributes.how-to-text:
* Use ideally in the evening, no more frequently than once per day.
* After cleaning, saturate a cotton pad with the formula and sweep across the face and neck.
* Do not use on sensitive, peeling or compromised skin.
* Avoid the eye contour and contact with the eyes.
* Do not rinse off.
* Continue with additional skin treatments as needed.
* Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency or duration. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised.
* Keep out of reach of children.
* Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.
attributes.description: A toning solution with 7% glycolic acid to exfoliate the skin and amino acids, aloe vera, ginseng and tasmanian pepperberry.
attributes.benefits: This 7% toning solution offers mild exfoliation for improved skin radiance and visible clarity. The formula also improves the appearance of skin texture with continued use.  This formula contains a studied Tasmanian Pepperberry derivative, which is of plant origin and varies in colour seasonally. This colour variation may be apparent in the formula from time to time. The formula is further supported with inclusion of ginseng root and aloe vera for both visible radiance and skin soothing benefits.
attributes.ingredients: Aqua (Water), Glycolic Acid, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Centaurea Cyanus Flower Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Propanediol, Glycerin, Triethanolamine, Aminomethyl Propanol, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Tasmannia Lanceolata Fruit/Leaf Extract, Aspartic Acid, Alanine, Glycine, Serine, Valine, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Glutamic Acid, Arginine, Pca, Sodium Pca, Sodium Lactate, Fructose, Glucose, Sucrose, Urea, Hexyl Nicotinate, Dextrin, Citric Acid, Polysorbate 20, Gellan Gum, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Chloride, Hexylene Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol.

attributes.name: Positive Light Silky Touch Highlighter
attributes.heading: 2.8g
attributes.how-to-text:
* Pair with the Positive Light Precision Highlighter Brush (sold separately) for best results. Use light strokes to apply to the high points of your face (i.e., tops of cheekbones, brow bone, bridge of the nose, cupid’s bow). Remember, less is more.
* It doubles as an eyeshadow. Apply to the lids for a glass-like sheen.
* Tip: For an even more intense highlight, first spritz your brush with the Rare Beauty’s Always an Optimist 4-in-1 Mist, then sweep across the powder and apply
attributes.description: Made of 50% pearl microshimmers set in a semi-sheer base, this highlighter is more delicate than it looks. Please handle gently!

Unexpectedly smooth, airy, and talc free, the unique semi-sheer base is packed with micro-shimmers that sync with your skin to enhance a range of skin tones. It is transfer-proof, smudge-proof, and water-resistant to keep you gleaming all day.

attributes.name: Original Fizzing Star Bath Soak
attributes.heading: 15g
attributes.how-to-text:
1. Drop a fizzing star into bathwater.
2. Wait for it to dissolve and enjoy a relaxing bubble bath.
attributes.description:
Take time out to relax and drop these fizzing stars into your bath!

An ultra-practical fizzing star that instantly dissolves and perfumes your bath for a moment of pure pleasure.
attributes.benefits:
The scented fizzing star dissolves instantly into a deliciously scented milk bath for an experience of pure bliss. The perfect feel-good gift for yourself or a loved one!
"These fizzing stars drop into your bath water to create a perfect moment of relaxation for you! Available in 5 addictive scents.

Scents:
- Cotton Flower scent: Cotton flower wraps you in a veil of silky softness.
- Cherry Blossom scent: A soft and sheer fragrance that makes you daydream around Spring's first blossoms.
- Monoi scent: Monoi and hot sand... anytime of the year, the most unforgettable summers come rushing back!
- Mango scent: Luscious and juicy mango gives you contagious energy!
- Lagoon scent: An aquatic blend of blue waterfalls, the effect of a fresh reboot!"

attributes.name: Airbrush Flawless Setting Spray
attributes.how-to-text:
* Hold airbrush flawless setting spray 6-8 inches away and mist over your entire face before and after applying makeup.
* Avoid eye areas.
attributes.description: A setting spray that weightlessly primes and sets for up to 16 hours for the perfect looking makeup day, every day.
attributes.benefits: This hydrating setting spray instantly locks in your look for makeup magic that looks ‘just applied’. Flawless film formers act as an invisible shield to help flawlessly set makeup all day without melting, fading or settling into lines. It also features aloe vera which contains vitamins and minerals. Skin is left feeling smooth and supple. Japanese green tea helps to create softer, hydrated feeling skin. Aromatic resin from the bark of a tree grown on the Greek island of Chios helps to keep pores clear.
attributes.ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Amp-acrylates/Allyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Pvp, Phenoxyethanol, Pentylene Glycol, Propanediol, Polysorbate 20, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice Powder, Parfum (Fragrance), Potassium Sorbate, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Camellia Oleifera Leaf Extract, Pistacia Lentiscus Gum, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Phenethyl Alcohol.
attributes.how-to:
* Hold airbrush flawless setting spray 6-8 inches away and mist over your entire face before and after applying makeup.
* Avoid eye areas.

attributes.name: Addict Lip Glow Lip Balm
attributes.how-to-text:
* Wear on its own for a subtle custom color-awakening effect and 24-hour hydration or as a primer by removing excess product before applying lipstick, for smoothed and hydrated lips.
* It can be worn under the corresponding shade of Dior Addict Lip Maximizer or Dior Addict Lip Glow Oil to play with the color.
attributes.description: A lip balm formulated with 97% natural-origin ingredients that subtly revives the natural color of lips with a custom glow for 6 hours and hydrates the lips for 24 hours.
attributes.benefits: Even richer, this new range of shades is designed to meet the needs of women and men based on their desires and skin tone. The Dior Addict Lip Glow lip balm is still infused at its core with color reviver technology that adapts to the pH of each person's lips, revealing a custom color that delivers just the right dose of color, with a subtle shine. The entire complexion is instantly enhanced with beautified glowy lips. The new formula is infused with cherry oil, and shades to suit all skin tones: the essential Dior Addict Lip Glow lip balm has been reinvented with an as always sensorial texture for lips that are both beautified and protected from dryness. Multi-use, Dior Addict Lip Glow can be worn on its own as a lip balm or as a primer under lipstick.
attributes.ingredients: Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Dimer Dilinoleate, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Jojoba Esters, Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, Candelilla Cera (Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax), Behenyl Behenate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Parfum (Fragrance), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Unsaponifiables, Diisostearyl Malate, Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Ethyl Vanillin, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Undaria Pinnatifida Extract, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Propyl Gallate, [+/- Ci 45380 (Red 21), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake)]

* Wear on its own for a subtle custom color-awakening effect and 24-hour hydration or as a primer by removing excess product before applying lipstick, for smoothed and hydrated lips.
* It can be worn under the corresponding shade of Dior Addict Lip Maximizer or Dior Addict Lip Glow Oil to play with the color.

attributes.name: Cream Lip Stain
attributes.heading: 5ml
attributes.how-to-text:
For best results, it is advisable to prepare the lips in advance. Your ideal go-to product is the SEPHORA COLLECTION Lip Scrub, to smooth and soften the skin before applying color.
For an even more flawless finish, wear your beloved SEPHORA COLLECTION Cream Lip Stain liquid lipstick with the Lip Stain Liner, a retractable lip pencil that provides precise definition, lasting hold, doesn’t transfer, and helps prolong the life of your lipstick. Choose one of the 20 shades that directly matches your SEPHORA COLLECTION Cream Lip Stain liquid lipstick, or play with contrasts to create an immediate volumizing effect.

1. Starting at the Cupid’s bow, give your mouth a defined silhouette by sliding the liner over the outer contour of the lip, across one side, then the other, then finally along the contour of the bottom lip.
2. For an even greater impression of plumpness, use your Lip Stain Liner to contour the lips – creating shadow areas and accentuating bright zones. Starting from the corners, thicken the lip liner along the lower lip, continuing upwards and across the upper lip. Don’t forget to accentuate the dip of your Cupid’s bow.
3. Lastly, apply a Sephora Collection Cream Lip Stain liquid lipstick in a slightly lighter shade to your lip liner over your lips.
attributes.description: A non-drying lipstick with a comfortable and velvety texture that provides full coverage and high-payoff color. Thanks to its formula enriched with avocado oil, this matte liquid lipstick feels creamy and provides comfort upon application before melting into a light velvety veil of long-lasting lip color.
attributes.benefits: It provides a long-lasting, no-transfer and maskproof makeup result without leaving a trace. It also comes with a precise applicator that allows you to apply exactly the right amount of product.

seo.meta-description: Buy Cream Lip Stain from Sephora Collection here. Meet the silky, long-lasting lip stain that keeps lips covered with bold colour, morning and night.

attributes.how-to:
For best results, it is advisable to prepare the lips in advance. Your ideal go-to product is the SEPHORA COLLECTION Lip Scrub, to smooth and soften the skin before applying color.
For an even more flawless finish, wear your beloved SEPHORA COLLECTION Cream Lip Stain liquid lipstick with the Lip Stain Liner, a retractable lip pencil that provides precise definition, lasting hold, doesn’t transfer, and helps prolong the life of your lipstick. Choose one of the 20 shades that directly matches your SEPHORA COLLECTION Cream Lip Stain liquid lipstick, or play with contrasts to create an immediate volumizing effect.

1. Starting at the Cupid’s bow, give your mouth a defined silhouette by sliding the liner over the outer contour of the lip, across one side, then the other, then finally along the contour of the bottom lip.
2. For an even greater impression of plumpness, use your Lip Stain Liner to contour the lips – creating shadow areas and accentuating bright zones. Starting from the corners, thicken the lip liner along the lower lip, continuing upwards and across the upper lip. Don’t forget to accentuate the dip of your Cupid’s bow.
3. Lastly, apply a Sephora Collection Cream Lip Stain liquid lipstick in a slightly lighter shade to your lip liner over your lips.

attributes.name: Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1%
attributes.how-to-text:
* Apply to entire face morning and evening before heavier creams.
* We do not recommend combining this product in the same regimen with Direct or Ethylated Vitamin C (LAA/ELAA) and Vitamin C Derivatives.
attributes.description: A high-strength vitamin and mineral blemish formula that reduces the appearance of skin blemishes and congestion.
attributes.benefits: This formula incorporates a high 10% concentration of Niacinamide, as well as a 1% concentration of Zinc to balance visible aspects of sebum activity, thereby reducing the appearance of textural irregularities, enlarged pores and visible shine. Niacinamide, also known as Vitamin B3, is a well-studied active ingredient that is renowned for its multiple benefits on the skin. It contributes to supporting the production of components that play a central role in the structural and functional integrity of the skin.
attributes.ingredients: Aqua (Water), Niacinamide, Pentylene Glycol, Zinc PCA, Tamarindus Indica Seed Gum, Xanthan Gum, Isoceteth-20, Ethoxydiglycol, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin.
attributes.how-to:

attributes.name: Warm Wishes Effortless Bronzer Stick
attributes.heading: 7g
attributes.how-to-text:
* Twist the bronzer stick to reveal the product and apply anywhere you’d like to add definition - swipe onto cheekbones, forehead, and chin, then blend with fingertips, a brush, or a sponge.
* It can even be applied to the eyelids to add dimension.
attributes.description: A breakthrough bronzing stick for an instant sun-kissed glow with a smooth, seamless, second-skin finish—just swipe on, blend, and go.
attributes.benefits: This innovative, liquid-like cream bronzer stick melts into the skin for a sun-kissed warmth that won’t fade. Ultra blendable and buildable, it glides on weightlessly, making it easy to softly sculpt the face. And the non-greasy, water-resistant formula won’t cake, crease, or clog pores.

attributes.name: Organic Cotton Pads
attributes.how-to-text: Use daily on your face, neck and eyes using your usual make-up remover or cleanser.
attributes.description: Organic cotton pads for face, eyes and neck.
attributes.benefits: Made with 100% organic cotton fibers, these Sephora Collection make-up remover pads help remove make-up without irritating the skin. They are GOTS certified by Ecocert. The embossed side helps remove make-up and the smooth side eliminates any residues.

attributes.name: Multi Peptide Serum for Hair Density
attributes.how-to-text:
* Massage a few drops thoroughly into a clean, dry scalp once daily, ideally at bedtime.
* This formula is a leave-in treatment. Do not wash hair or scalp after application.
* If irritation occurs, rinse off, cease use and consult a physician.
* Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised.
* Keep out of reach of children.
attributes.description: A lightweight serum for fuller, healthier-looking hair.
attributes.benefits: Multi-Peptide Serum for Hair Density is a concentrated leave-in formula designed to support the scalp and give you thicker, denser, fuller-looking hair. The formula is lightweight and offers a combination of peptide technologies alongside a series of plant-based extracts.
attributes.ingredients: Aqua (Water), Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Caffeine, Biotinoyl Tripeptide-1, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3, Larix Europaea Wood Extract, Pisum Sativum Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Triticum Vulgare Germ Extract, Glycine Soja Germ Extract, Trifolium Pratense Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Apigenin, Oleanolic Acid, Arginine, Glycine, Calcium Gluconate, Zinc Chloride, Lactic Acid, Gluconolactone, Dextran, Maltodextrin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Xanthan Gum, Pentylene Glycol, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Polysorbate 20, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Metabisulfite, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin.

attributes.name: Tattoo Liner Liquid Eyeliner
attributes.heading: 0.55ml
attributes.how-to-text:
* Storage Tip: Always store Tattoo Liner tip-down so the brush stays saturated.
* Shake before use to keep the formula flowing.
* Still feeling dry? Wipe tip with a damp tissue to remove eyeshadow build-up.
* When applying, use very light pressure for fine, exact lines (perfect for creating sharp cat eyeliner wings). Add more pressure to create a thicker, bold eyeliner look. The formula is also great for layering, so you can keep drawing over your lines until you achieve liner perfection.
* How to Fake Freckles: Using shade Mad Max Brown, make small dots wherever you want your faux freckles. Then use your fingers to tap the product into skin and make freckles appear more natural. For deeper skin tones, let the dots sit on skin for a few seconds before tapping.
attributes.description: An award-winning, waterproof liquid eyeliner with all-day wear and opaque pigment for creating ultra-precise lines inspired by tattoo artistry.
attributes.benefits: This high-pigment vegan formula is smudge-resistant and lasts all day. Shake before use to keep the ink flowing. Always store tip-down so the brush stays saturated. Create any look imaginable: The key is the fine-point brush tip for easy application, making Tattoo Liner the must-have eyeliner for everyone.

attributes.name: Eye Masks
attributes.how-to-text:
The morning after a sleepless night, or in the evening after a long day spent staring at a screen, use Sephora Collection’s eye patches to quickly and effectively rescue your eyes. Five minutes is all it takes, thanks to their bio-cellulose composition and super-ingredients. If any product remains on the skin around the eyes after the eye patches are removed, tap delicately until it is absorbed. No need to rinse.

The beautiful skin combo: Why not pamper your skin at home? To complement the effect of Sephora Collection’s eye patches, we also offer an entire range of targeted-action masks to pamper your face. Choose your favorite super-ingredients amongst our eucalyptus fiber face masks or our vitamin-rich face masks.
attributes.description: The skin in the eye contour area is so thin and delicate that it needs extra special care to stay beautiful. There's always a solution to every problem with Sephora Collection’s eye masks. They help relieve puffiness and under eye dark circles, as well as moisturize and smooth the skin. The bio-cellulose eye patches are formulated with 91% naturally derived ingredients and enriched with plant extracts to make your eyes even more beautiful.
attributes.benefits:
Sephora Collection’s eye masks are made of bio-cellulose extracted from fermented coconut water. This ultra-thin, super-absorbent material absorbs three times more serum than a nonwoven fabric, and absorbs the active ingredients more effectively to produce results in just five minutes! In line with our exacting standards, Sephora Collection has selected four super-ingredients known for their ability to reduce puffiness and under eye dark circles, brighten, hydrate, and smooth skin to suit your own personal needs.

Each eye patch delivers its own specific treatment:
- Cucumber: With its high vitamin and mineral content, cucumber is ideal for soothing delicate skin.
- Pomegranate: The vitamins contained in pomegranate tone the skin to awaken your eyes in just a blink!
- Caffeine: Our caffeine is extracted from green coffee beans. Known for its energy-boosting properties, it is perfect for awakening tired and dull eyes!
- Watermelon: Watermelon’s draws its ability to hydrate and soften skin from its high water, vitamin, and mineral content.

attributes.name: Positive Light Tinted Moisturizer SPF 20
attributes.heading: 30ml
attributes.how-to-text:
* Shake it up, then massage a few drops into skin using your fingertips. You can also use the Liquid Touch Foundation Brush or damp beauty sponge to blend. For fuller coverage, add a few more drops!
* Where extra coverage is needed, such as on blemishes and under the eyes, dot on Liquid Touch Brightening Concealer and blend.
* For best results: Prep skin first with your preferred Always an Optimist primer. For even longer wear, set with Always an Optimist Soft Radiance Setting Powder.
attributes.description: A flexible tinted moisturizer that instantly blurs skin with glowy, light to medium coverage—all while hydrating and protecting skin from the sun.
attributes.benefits: This super comfortable, breathable tinted formula blends like moisturiser into a smooth, hydrated, naturally radiant finish. It instantly blurs and evens out skin tone while reducing the look of pores and fine lines. With built-in SPF 20 sunscreen plus Vitamin E, you get the sun protection you need, minus the ick of traditional sunscreens. Never sticky or greasy, your skin feels nice and moisturised.  Long-lasting coverage so weightless, it actually moves with your skin instead of settling into it. Meaning it wears evenly and you always look and feel like you. It comes in 24 flexible shades to fit a range of skin tones without ever leaving an ashy undertone.

attributes.name: Foot Masks
attributes.how-to-text:
1. Put the socks on after first washing and drying your feet.
2. Peel off the tab on the adhesive strip and secure the top of the sock around your ankle.
3. Leave for 20 minutes. Gently massage in any remaining product. No need to rinse.
Do not walk around whilst wearing the masks and always massage in any remaining product after removal, in case you slip over. Use twice weekly.
attributes.description: 92% of ingredients of natural origin – Leakproof skincare socks – For a shot of intense skincare!
attributes.benefits:
Made from ingredients at least 92% of which are of natural origin, our Sephora Collection foot masks are enriched with plant extracts. Our pretty, leakproof socks contain a gel that delivers a full treatment shot in just 20 minutes! The nourishing, hydrating and restorative (or refreshing and anti-fatigue) masks are just what dry or tired feet need and deliver an instantly comforting feeling.

Our super-ingredients have been selected according to very strict criteria, to best meet your skin's needs:
- Coconut: Coconut oil is rich in fatty acids and is used to comfort dry skin, owing to its soothing, nourishing properties!
- Cactus: Known for its moisturizing properties, cactus is just the thing to “wake up” tired feet!

attributes.benefits: This formula offers non-greasy hydration that acts as a direct topical supplement of impaired NMF components. It contains 11 amino acids, phospholipids, alpha/beta/gamma fatty acids, triglycerides, sterols and sterol esters, glycerin, ceramide precursors, urea, saccharides, sodium PCA and hyaluronic acid and offers immediate hydration and lasting results with continued use.
attributes.ingredients: Aqua (Water), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetyl Alcohol, Propanediol, Stearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Glucose, Maltose, Fructose, Trehalose, Sodium Pca, Pca, Sodium Lactate, Urea, Allantoin, Linoleic Acid, Oleic Acid, Phytosteryl Canola Glycerides, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Lecithin, Triolein, Tocopherol, Carbomer, Isoceteth-20, Polysorbate 60, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Pentylene Glycol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin.
attributes.how-to:
* Apply after serums as needed for effective surface hydration.
* If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician.
* Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised.
* Keep out of reach of children.

attributes.name: Easy Bake Loose Powder
attributes.heading: 20g
attributes.how-to-text:
* Prep your skin with a moisturiser or primer.
* Apply concealer under the eye.
* Flip the jar upside down and tap the base twice to release the powder.
* Apply a generous layer of powder under the eye, on the T-zone, laugh lines, outer corners of the mouth and chin.
* Let the powder bake for 3 to 5 minutes.
* Gently dust away excess powder.
* Use throughout the day to touch up, and control shine without the cake.
attributes.description: An easy-to-use loose powder, perfectly curated for all skin tones to create an airbrushed, longlasting complexion while blurring the appearance of pores and fine lines, and holding makeup in place all day long.
attributes.benefits: This powder is easy to use due to its unique powder net which disperses a controlled amount of powder. This extremely light and silky texture blends seamlessly into the skin leaving it matte with a hint of sheen, for a luminous finish that controls shine throughout the day. Eight shades, packed with ultra-refined pigments, ensure the right fit for all skin tones. The powders work to subtly colour correct and highlight different contours of the face, leaving a translucent veil of colour on your skin, so you can bake, without the cake.
attributes.ingredients: Talc, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Dimethicone, Nylon-12, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Oryza Sativa Starch / Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Phenyl Trimethicone, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Parfum / Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate, Benzyl Salicylate, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Coumarin, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Benzoate, Ci 77492 / Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Ci 77491 / Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Ci 77007 / Ultramarines (Ci 77007)

attributes.name: Almost Lipstick
attributes.heading: 1.9g
attributes.how-to-text:
* Apply directly to the lips.
* You can easily layer for more dramatic results.
attributes.description: Not quite a lipstick, not quite a gloss, this Clinique classic is more like a balm you can easily layer.
attributes.benefits: Transparent pigment glides on a sheer, glossy slip of lightweight colour. Emollient-rich formula gives lips a sleek, moist finish. Cult-classic black honey is famous for its chameleon-like ability to flatter all skin tones yet look different on everyone. Don’t be fooled by the way it looks in the tube. The sheer formula is part of its mystique. It’s also very forgiving. You don’t even need a mirror to put it on.
